docs.lead_paragraph: Although water pipes are commonly viewed as less dangerous to health than cigarettes, they are just as bad, researchers say.

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers in New York estimate that a newly discovered virus, canine hepacivirus, also known as CHV, shared an ancestor with the hepatitis C virus 500 to 1,000 years ago.

headline.seo: Scientists Discover a Relative of Hepatitis C Virus in Dogs
headline.main: Viral Outbreaks in Dogs Yield Clues on Origins of Hepatitis C
headline.print_headline: Viral Outbreaks in Dogs Yield Clues on Origins of Hepatitis C

docs.snippet: Researchers in New York estimate that a newly discovered virus, canine hepacivirus, also known as CHV, shared an ancestor with the hepatitis C virus 500 to 1,000 years ago.

docs.lead_paragraph: The pharmaceutical giant GlaxoSmithKline said it would fulfill a promise made several years ago to use 20 percent of the profits it made in the world’s poorest countries to finance health care initiatives.

headline.main: Pharmaceutical Giant to Give $5.7 Million Toward Health Programs in Poor Countries
headline.print_headline: BRITAIN: Pharmaceutical Giant to Give $5.7 Million Toward Health Programs in Poor Countries

docs.lead_paragraph: The fight against the disease has altered medicine, shaped research and highlighted the challenges that remain.

headline.main: 30 Years In, We Are Still Learning From AIDS
headline.print_headline: 30 Years In, We Are Still Learning From AIDS
headline.sub: On its way from mysterious killer to chronic illness, AIDS has altered medicine, shaped innumerable lives and highlighted the challenges that remain.;

docs.snippet: The fight against the disease has altered medicine, shaped research and highlighted the challenges that remain.
